```java
server: 
    port: ${port:2222}

spring: 
    application:
        name: first-service

logging:
    pattern:
        console: "%d{HH:mm:ss.SSS} %-5level %logger{36} - %msg%n"
        file: "%d{HH:mm:ss.SSS} [%thread] %-5level %logger{36} - %msg%n"
    level:
        org.springframework.web: DEBUG
    file: app.log
```
